subsc: General education sector,Tertiary education,Secondary education,Central government administration

abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the Human
            Resources Development Project is to improve the capacity of
            the Government institutions in a sustainable fashion, by
            resolving the acute shortage of skilled and professional
            manpower.  The project has three components: 1) Recruitment
            of international experts to fill 500 key positions in the
            University of Asmara (UA), the civil service and the teacher
            training institutes;  2) External training for 500 Eritrean
            nationals in highly specialized disciplines; and       3)
            Institutional strengthening of the UA, human development
            units in central ministeries, and the project coordinating unit.
